name: Magic Crochet Fox
description:
-- MAGIC CROCHET FOX --
Magic Crochet Fox is a top view action game that will entangle your mind! You are a fox and your main objective is to stop the Clew Cat Gang invading your villages! Use Crochet Hooks in order to disentangle all of these evil cats!

-- JOIN(T)ED TOGETHER --

You can join an enemy with yourself as an weaponized pendulum against nearby enemies! Spin your enemies so they disassemble completely! Spinny splendi!

-- HOW TO PLAY --

 WASD - Movement // Left Mouse Click - Shoot Hooks // Mouse Movement - Aim // P - Pause

(This game at its current state has no full gamepad support)

-- GMTK GAME JAM 2021 SUBMISSION --

This game is a submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2021, made in a time period of a 2 days between June 11th to April 13rd.

Team: KMajima and MotherBruno

Programming, Art, Game Design, SFX and VFX were all made by me (KMajima).

Music made by MotherBruno!

Minor UI art assets by Kenney.

Check out my Twitter here: https://twitter.com/KaitoMajima
Check Out Bruno's soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/brunoalmeid

-- DISCLAIMER --

There was an error that prevented the music from actually playing. I'll try to fix it in the 30 min grace period.

UPDATE: Updated the WebGL version and Windows version with the music within the grace period (Version 1.0.0)

-- WARNING --

This game may have flashing lights included. Discretion is advised.
